sentences.en: After all, what more can anyone be than themselves?
sentences.cn: 毕竟，人们除了做自己又能怎样呢？

sentences.en: Anyone could have got in and doped the wine.
sentences.cn: 任何人都可能会进来在酒中掺麻醉剂。

sentences.en: Anyone could win tonight.
sentences.cn: 今晚任何人都可能赢。

sentences.en: Anyone else who is interested in going on the trip should see me at the end of this lesson.
sentences.cn: 还有谁有兴趣参加此次旅行，下课来找我。

sentences.en: Anyone would think you were in love with the girl.
sentences.cn: 谁都会以为你和那个姑娘恋爱了。

sentences.en: But will anyone have the bottle to go through with it?
sentences.cn: 但是谁会有胆量经受这件事？

sentences.en: Despite his unconventional methods, he has inspired pupils more than anyone else.
sentences.cn: 尽管他的方法不同寻常，但他给予学生的激励比其他人都要多。

sentences.en: He appealed for information from anyone who saw the attackers.
sentences.cn: 他呼吁任何看见袭击者的人提供信息。

sentences.en: I think your concern is misplaced. Ackroyd is no threat to anyone.
sentences.cn: 我认为你多虑了，阿克罗伊德不会对任何人构成威胁。

sentences.en: I was set to shut out anyone else who came knocking.
sentences.cn: 其他任何人来敲门，我都决意将其拒之门外。

sentences.en: If anyone sees Lisa, ask her to call me.
sentences.cn: 如果有谁看见莉萨，叫她打电话给我。

sentences.en: In case anyone was following me, I made an elaborate detour.
sentences.cn: 为了防止有人跟踪我，我特地绕了弯路。

sentences.en: it was still anyone's game at half-time.
sentences.cn: 中场休息时还是平局。

sentences.en: it was still anyone's game at half-time.
sentences.cn: 中场休息时还是平局。

sentences.en: It's not a case of whether anyone would notice or not.
sentences.cn: 这不是会不会有人注意到的问题。

sentences.en: It's very dispiriting for anyone to be out of a job.
sentences.cn: 每个人都会对事业很懊丧。

sentences.en: She never participated in obtaining or copying any classified documents for anyone.
sentences.cn: 她从未参与过为任何人获取或复制机密文件之事。

sentences.en: They drummed it into her that she was not to tell anyone.
sentences.cn: 他们反复告诫她，让她不要告诉任何人。

sentences.en: They offer help and advice to anyone interested in becoming a teacher.
sentences.cn: 他们为任何有兴趣当老师的人提供帮助和咨询。

sentences.en: three shandies and he's anyone's.
sentences.cn: 他只要三杯落肚便会接受任何人的性挑逗。

sentences.en: You needn't talk to anyone if you don'twant to.
sentences.cn: 不想说话的时候，你可以不说。

sentences.en: You'll never love anyone the way you love your baby.
sentences.cn: 你决不会像疼爱自己的孩子一样疼爱别人。

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)（人）接受任何人性爱的

trans.tran_cn: 任何人，随便哪个人，重要人物
trans.tran_en: used to refer to any person, when it is not important to say exactly who
